Description: Oxford Mining Company, LLC (Oxford) has been ordered to pay $650,000 in fines and community service for the negligent failure to report violations of the company's permit in connection with its coal mining operations. Oxford was fined $500,000 and ordered to pay $150,000 in community service as part of the sentence.
Info Source: http://www.justice.gov/usao-sdoh/pr/mining-company-sentenced-epa-violations

Description: Western Energy Company, operator of the Rosebud Mine on federal coal leases outside of Billings, Montana paid the United States more than $12 million in mineral royalties and accrued interest as the result of a settlement agreement announced by the Justice Department and Department of the Interior.
Agency: Interior Department referral to the Justice Department
Info Source: https://www.justice.gov/opa/pr/western-energy-company-will-pay-122-million-us-montana-settle-coal-royalties-dispute
Contained in data received from the agency on November 30, 2020 in response to an open records request.
Contained in data received from the agency on November 30, 2020 in response to an open records request.
